Name: Kings&Cities
About the game: ◦ Resources management In Kings&Cities, resources are represented by gauges. Make your choices wisely, because if one of them falls to 0, it is the end of your leadership on Epeiros. ◦ Leader's quests During your games, the ruler of your kingdom will send you quests. Complete them to obtain favors. ◦ Diplomacy Relations with other kingdoms and empires fluctuate depending on your actions. Find powerful allies to help you but beware! Times are hard and betrayals are common. ◦ Cultures & Religions The factions of Kings&Cities are separated into 5 cultures and 6 religions offering great replayability.
Meta Title: Kings&Cities: Sep 11, 2022, Askoed and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kings&Cities? Check out the release date (Sep 11, 2022), developer insights from Askoed, and a complete game summary.
